author: Mark Grant
comment: Worked pretty much perfectly with my Sony smart watch 3 and the wahoo TICKRX.
title: Worked really well

author: rajat bagadthey
comment: Works with zenwatch 2 and zephyr smart hrm,  Does not work with Androidwear 2.0 -  can't find the watch face

author: Tamás Körözsi
comment: it doesn't work with Polar M600's led sensors

author: Brandon Malina
comment: Doesn't work with gear live watch

author: Reynaldo Gil García
comment: Reporting work ok connecting sw3 and mio link.  I can not choose the interactive mode in setup
title: First that connect directly from watch to hrm

author: Jon-Paul Leduc
comment: Button to keep screen on is below screen on moto 360 (in flat tire area).  Otherwise it works well.  Wish it could save /transfer log to phone, then would be only app I need.
title: Simple tool that works well. Minor bug

author: Paul Thomas
comment: All good, except that on my Sony Smartwatch 3 the text is a bit too large on the device chooser screen. Can still read it, but the bottom few pixels on each text box are cropped. Good job otherwise, using it with a Polar H7 chest strap.
title: Nice app.

author: Q B
comment: Has this been tested with the moto360 and Mio link? Looks like a good app.
title: Moto360 & Mio Link
